remarks: Equivalence of two versions of the Axiom of Choice.  The left-hand side is defined as the Axiom of Choice (first form) of [Enderton] p. 49.  The right-hand side is the Axiom of Choice of [TakeutiZaring] p. 83.  The proof does not depend on AC. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2004.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dfac3 $p |- ( CHOICE <-> A. x E. f A. z e. x ( z =/= (/) -> ( f ` z ) e. z ) ) $.
$d f x z $.
